Path_to_Glass_House.name: Path_to_Glass_House
Path_to_Glass_House.description:
You are on the path to the modernist marvel in New Canaan CT.
How did you get here?

exits.description: There are stairs leading down to the underground tunnel.
There is a path that leads to the guest house.
The kitchen is ahead.

underground_tunnel.name: underground_tunnel
underground_tunnel.description:
You have found the underground tunnel leading to the Guest House.
It is darker down here.
You get the sense a secret is nearby, but you only see the tunnel from which you came from.

exits.description: There are stairs leading up out of the tunnel.
A trapdoor was hidden amongst the dust.

guest_house.name: guest_house
guest_house.description:
The underground tunnel leads you to a secretive, decorative, and completely enclosed Guest House. 
It's dim and cozy in here.

exits.description: There is a path leading to the Glass House.
There is a slide that can take you down to the Pavillion in the Pond.

Pavillion.name: Pavillion
Pavillion.description:
There's definitely something large moving in the pond. 
This part of the estate is more open, so maybe you'd like it here.

exits.description: There is a path leading to the Guest House.
There is a dumbwaiter near the chimney.

painting_gallery.name: painting_gallery
painting_gallery.description: There's a strange painting here on that looks like a switch.

exits.description: Fiddle with the switch.
Go back to the Pavillion.

simulation.name: simulation
simulation.description:
You were inside a virtual simulation exploring the Glass House.
...
I guess you escaped.

kitchen.name: kitchen
kitchen.description: You've found the kitchen. Everything looks sleek and like I'm not supposed to touch it.

exits.description: There is a door ahead that takes you out of the Glass House.
There is a peculiar bathroom.

cylindrical_bathroom.name: cylindrical_bathroom
cylindrical_bathroom.description: You explore the cylindrical bathroom. What are you doing?

exits.description: Exit down the hill to the Pavillion.
Exit on the right to the kitchen.
Exit at the bottom.

dumbwaiter.name: dumbwaiter
dumbwaiter.description: You crawl into the dumbwaiter. What are you doing?

exits.description: Exit in the kitchen.
Exit at the bottom of the secret room.

secretRoom.name: secretRoom
secretRoom.description:
You have found the secret room.
Who thought more Barcelona chairs a good idea?

exits.description: You see a trapdoor with a spider crawling on it.
Get back in the dumbwaiter.
